channel.title: What file edit to change ip on a server client?
channel.description:
Hey guys , sorry for this question , but i have aproblem:
I downloaded a server client, but when i open it and i put user and pass, there is no ip changer, so i cant put an ip, what client file i have to edit to put my own ip and how? thank you.

item.title: What file edit to change ip on a server client?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Search for the current IP and change it to either “Localhost” or “127.0.0.1”

Read full topic
item.source: What file edit to change ip on a server client?
